alert.note: Alert for Haakon; Ziebach (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 05 at 11:02AM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Haakon and southeastern Ziebach Counties through 1130 AM MDT... At 1102 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 5 miles northeast of Intersection of Cherry Creek and Sunnybrook Roads to 4 miles northwest of Cherry Creek to 8 miles west of Billsburg. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cherry Creek, Milesville, South Eagle Butte, Kirley, Billsburg, Intersection of Highway 63 and BIA Road 8, Intersection of Cherry Creek and Sunnybrook Roads and southwestern Cheyenne River Reservation. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 300 PM MDT for west central South Dakota.
